rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BMS2062, BTH3757, MOL2022}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BIO1022, BIO1722} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BTH1802})
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BIO1022, BIO1722}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BMS2062, BTH3757, MOL2022}

description: In order to carry out any DNA manipulation a large variety of enzymes and specialised techniques are used.  This unit will provide the opportunity to gain an understanding of the nature and use of the "tools of the trade" applied routinely by molecular biologists.  This includes the management of biological databases. A wide variety of applications will be explored, ranging from human disease situations to genetic modification of crop species.
